Description: GIBSON LES PAUL FADED T - MINT CONDITION WITH LEATHER GIBSON GIG BAG This guitar was bought for a student who has basically played it a few hours and then never looked at it again, therefore you are getting as close to a brand new guitar as you can get (see pics). No fret wear (see pics)***** Remember to check out my 100% five star customer reviews. *****The benefits of a modern Gibson guitar and the appeal of a pawn shop prize - both are yours with the Gibson Les Paul Faded T. The Les Paul Faded T's new-meets-old approach is exemplified in three key features: a SlimTaper maple neck shaped to mimic the natural wear of decades of playing; a weight-relieved mahogany body, which you'll be able and proud to strap on for hours at a time with its low weight and Faded Gloss finish; and a pair of Gibson 490 pickups that speak with a golden PAF-like tone, only with more bite and wax potting to reduce squeals. Gibson Les Paul Faded 2017 T Electric Guitar at a Glance: Plek'd for precision playabilityUltra-Modern body is weight relieved for comfortSlimTaper maple neck plays fast and smoothGibson 490 pickups are a modern take on a 1960s classicPlek'd for precision playability This Les Paul Faded 2017 T feels fast and precise, thanks in large part to Plek processing. Typically reserved for top-dollar custom guitars, this process levels the frets with pinpoint precision, providing you with the most playable fretboard you're likely to own. Each note rings loud and clear, and the fret edges feel smooth as silk.Gibson Les Paul Faded 2017 T Electric Guitar Features: A modern Les Paul with pre-worn charmUltra-Modern mahogany body is weight relieved for longer nights onstageMaple SlimTaper neck is shaped to resemble a vintage instrumentRosewood fingerboard delivers classic Les Paul sustainGibson 490 pickups pay tribute to turning-point tones of the 1960sDecked out with vintage-style keystone tuners and Black Top Hat knobsAluminum Tune-o-matic bridge is lightweight and tonally matched to the guitarPlek'd for precision playability
